tool_description: Access all heroes of DotA 2. With more than 120 available heroes. This api get you all necessary information about each specific hero.
title: DotA 2 Heroes

api_list.name: Get Heroes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dota-2-heroes1.p.rapidapi.com/Dota/Heroes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dota-2-heroes1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
